antiPatterns.name: Maybe It is Not RPC
antiPatterns.description: A service provides mainly CRUD-type operations for significant business entities that most likely need many parameters and therefore cause poor system performance.
antiPatterns.consequences: Such fine-grained interactions may cause poor performance due to chaining of synchronous requests.
